vmIntro:
VisionMatrix Technology Limited provide user with accurate, fast, low-costand scalable video search solutions to search people, objects, behavioursand other targets ofinterest from a mass amount of videos. By leveragingour team of research and development experts, we aspire to enrich theworld with visual intelligence to make it safe and efficient.

VisionMatrix is committed to developing an accurate, secure and profes-sional video search engine to provide our customers with fast, accurateone-stop video search services based on global internet social platforms aswell as private databases,while safeguarding their data privacy.
